removals.expression: ((A[(j * m + k)] * alpha) * B[(i * m + k)])
removals.replacement: A[j * m + k] * alpha * B[i * m + k]
removals.reasoning: Parentheses around chained multiplications are redundant; * is left-associative and has higher precedence than +. Subscript parentheses are also unnecessary.

removals.expression: ((B[(j * m + k)] * alpha) * A[(i * m + k)])
removals.replacement: B[j * m + k] * alpha * A[i * m + k]
removals.reasoning: Parentheses around chained multiplications are redundant; * is left-associative and has higher precedence than +. Subscript parentheses are also unnecessary.
